Entries.pamHouseUpgrade: Oh, sweetie... that was so nice of you to put {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PamName}} up in a beautiful new house!$h#$e#It warms my heart when people take care of each other like that...
Entries.pamHouseUpgradeAnonymous: Call me a silly old fool... but I think I have an idea who paid for {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PamName}}'s new house... *wink*
Entries.Tue: Don't mind my {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Husband:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GeorgeGender}}}}, {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GeorgeName}}. {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GeorgeGender}}}} isn't very friendly to strangers.#$e#If you get to know {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Him:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GeorgeGender}}}} better {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GeorgeGender}}}}'ll warm up to you.#$e#I'm sure you two could become good friends one day!$h#$e#Since you're so interested in my {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Husband:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GeorgeGender}}}} I'll let you in on a little secret: {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GeorgeGender}}}} really likes leeks! You can find them in the mountains this time of year.
Entries.Tue6: It's nice of you to take the time to visit {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GeorgeName}} and I.#$e#Without young people around, we'd age much faster.$h
Entries.Fri: {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GeorgeName}} spends the whole day in front of that darned television set.#$e#I wish {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GeorgeGender}}}}'d go outside more. Some fresh air would do {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Him:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GeorgeGender}}}} good.
Entries.summer_Tue: {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GeorgeName}} is always a little less grumpy in the summer. The warm weather softens {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/His:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GeorgeGender}}}} bones.#$e#You might not be able to tell, but I can. I've known {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Him:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GeorgeGender}}}} for sixty years!
Entries.fall_Tue: I've been putting raisins in {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GeorgeName}}'s oatmeal... but {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GeorgeGender}}}} hasn't said a word. I wonder if {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GeorgeGender}}}} even notices these things?
Entries.fall_Sat: Are you friends with {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/AlexName}}?#$e#Sometime {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/AlexGender}}}} worries me sick.
Entries.winter_Sat8: @, have I told you that {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GeorgeName}} and I have lived in our house for 30 years?#$e#I hope you stay here for a while.$h
Entries.summer_Mon_inlaw_Alex: How's my grand{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Son:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/AlexGender}}}} doing? I imagine {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/AlexGender}}}}'s quite happy living on the farm.#$e#{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/AlexGender}}}} deserves to be happy... {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/AlexGender}}}}'s a good {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Boy:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/AlexGender}}}}.

Entries.winter_17.000: This is one of the newer traditions in Pelican Town... but we've taken to it rather quickly. Haven't we, {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GeorgeName}}?
Entries.23.000: Now now, dear... It's important that Doctor {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/HarveyName}} takes a good look at you. {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/HarveyGender}}}}'s a nice young {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Man:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/HarveyGender}}}}! Behave yourself, for your dear old wife's sake.
Entries.23.001: Could you check {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/His:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GeorgeGender}}}} lungs? {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GeorgeGender}}}}'s been wheezing lately.

BeforeMovie.Text: I've never been a fan of scary movies, but I'll try to keep an open mind.

AfterMovie.Text: I had to close my eyes during most of it...$s
